label:
This is an in-app notification that is sent to the creator of the event post when a user edits a comment that has been posted on the original event post.
You can insert the following dynamic values:

##ActivityTitle## - Head description of event
##FullName## - Name of the user who added a comment

template.message: ##FullName## has edited a comment on your post: ##ActivityTitle##
template.desktopMessage: ##FullName## has edited a comment on your post: ##ActivityTitle##
